title: Test
yAxis: Inflation rate change compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate change compared to previous year, with a total of 31 data points.
Overall Inflation rate change compared to previous year has decreased over the Year

Inflation rate change compared to previous year is rapidly decreasing from 1994 to 1998, rapidly increasing from 1998 to 1999, rapidly decreasing from 1999 to 2002, rapidly increasing from 2002 to 2005, gradually decreasing from 2005 to 2006, rapidly increasing from 2006 to 2008, rapidly decreasing from 2008 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2011, rapidly decreasing from 2011 to 2013, rapidly increasing from 2013 to 2015, rapidly decreasing from 2015 to 2016, roughly constant from 2016 to 2017, gradually decreasing from 2017 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2024.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1994 and 1995.
Max Inflation rate change compared to previous year about 891.19 was recorded at Year 1994
Min Inflation rate change compared to previous year about 0.26 was recorded at Year 2013
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate change compared to previous year, with a total of 31 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2024.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2002 to 2008.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2013.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2013 to 2017.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 1998 to 2002.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 1994 to 1998.
